LanguageData.RqRCFA_Label_TechLevelThresholdDesc: The value above which the difference in the project's and researcher's tech levels ceases to affect the final cost of the research project.
LanguageData.RqRCFA_Label_TechLevelFactorDesc: The value that is multiplied by the difference in the project's and researcher's tech levels is the coefficient of the research project's cost.
LanguageData.RqRCFA_Label_CostIncreaseDesc: Increase in the project cost depending on the difference in the project's and researcher's tech levels.
LanguageData.RqRCFA_Label_CostFactorExplanationDesc:
R - Result cost value
B - Base cost value
D - Tech levels difference
F - Difference factor
LanguageData.RqRCFA_Label_TableDesc: Table of research project cost values, assuming the base cost is 1000.
